patterns: When does the application window open?
When does deposit payment deadline happen?
When is semester registration?
responses: For the application window cohort 1 opens on the 6th of February 2024 and for cohort 2 same date
The deadline payment for hostel,tuition and meal plan is 2nd September 2024 for cohort 1 and 13th January 2025 for cohort 2
The semester deadline is 20th September 2024 for cohort 1 and for cohort 2 is 31st January 2025

patterns: why Academic City?
is Academic City the number 1 university?
why should i choose Academic City university?
why Academic City is good for me?
why should i apply at Academic City university?
why Academic City university?
responses: The Pakistan Institute of Engineering and Applied Sciences, is a public research university located in Islamabad, Pakistan. The university is modelled on international standards with a strong focus on the scientific advancement of the nuclear science-related STEM fields and medical sciences.Founded in 1967 as Reactor School from the sponsorship of the Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission in response to support and manage the nuclear energy infrastructure in the country, the institute started its educational activities with the affiliation of Quaid-e-Azam University, and became Centre for Nuclear Studies (CNS) in 1976— the center gained its new name and became independent as public university in 1997. In 2000, the PIEAS was granted the status of a doctorate degree awarding institute. PIEAS is based on a 150 acres (0.61 km2; 0.23 sq mi) campus and has around 135 full-time faculty members.As of 2017, Higher Education Commission rated PIEAS as the 1st leading engineering university in Pakistan. The QS World University Rankings ranked it as 390th worldwide while QS Asia University Rankings ranked it as 3rd in Pakistan, 189th overall in Asia in 2022. It is ranked 47th in QS top 50 under 50. Located at:Lehtrar Rd, Nilore, Islamabad Capital Territory

patterns: What is the procedure of a readmission in an undergraduate program for former students?
What procedure do former students have to go through in order to take an admission in an undergraduate program ?

how former student can apply for admission

Can a former student who has been on disciplinary warning get a readmission ?
Can a student with 3 academic warnings take admission?
How many times a student is allowed to take admission after 3 academic warnings?
responses: A former student of the university seeking readmission in an undergraduate program can do so by taking the relevant admission test. After qualifying for the admission on merit, the student is admitted as a NEW student.

patterns: What is the cost for double occupancy?
Can you tell me about the double occupancy rooms?
Price for double occupancy
Details about double occupancy room
What does double occupancy include?
responses: Double Occupancy rooms include a bunk bed for two, a desk and chair per person, a wardrobe and storage closet per person, Wi-Fi access, and a ceiling fan. The pricing for Ghanaian students is GH₵9,375.00 per semester, and for International students, it's $825.00 per semester.

patterns: How much is double occupancy with AC?
Tell me more about double occupancy rooms with AC
Cost for double occupancy with air conditioning
Features of double occupancy plus AC room
responses: Double Occupancy +AC rooms offer a bunk bed for two, a desk and chair per person, a split air conditioning unit, wardrobe and storage closet per person, Wi-Fi access, and a ceiling fan. The cost for Ghanaian students is GH₵12,500.00 per semester and $1,150.00 for International students per semester.

patterns: What does the single occupancy with AC cost?
Details about single occupancy with AC
Pricing for single occupancy with air conditioning
Features of single occupancy AC room
responses: Single Occupancy + AC rooms include a single bed for one, a desk and chair, a dedicated air conditioning unit, a wardrobe and storage closet, Wi-Fi access, and a ceiling fan. Pricing for Ghanaian students is GH₵25,000.00 per semester and $2,300.00 for International students per semester.

patterns: What types of rooms do you have?
Can you tell me about the room options?
Room categories and prices
Different types of room accommodations
responses: We offer several room types including Double Occupancy, Double Occupancy +AC, and Single Occupancy +AC. For more specific information on each type, you can ask about double occupancy, double occupancy with AC, or single occupancy with AC.
